description: ff. 40. 245 x 150; 208 x 100 mm. 11 lin. 1138 H. The pseudo-Aristotelian Secretum secretorum: Steinschneider, Die arabischen Übersetzungen aus dem Griechischen, p. 79sq., Brockelmann, GAL, I, 221 (2); S I, 364; Gätje-Daiber, Der Islam, v. 42 (1965) p. 71-78. The present ms. contains the recension in eight maqālāt. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... اما بعد اصلح الله امىر المؤمنىن واىده على حماىة الدىن
subject: Education of princes
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
